explains: n. （计划或理论的）纲要，图解；（逻）（三段论法的）格；（康德哲学的）先验图式
wordGroup: database schema 数据库模式；数据库架构
conceptual schema 概率模式；概念框图

sentences.en: The XML document is checked against a very restrictive schema.
sentences.cn: 该 XML 文档是由一个限制非常严格的模式进行检查的。

sentences.en: This reduces the effort to write and maintain the schema, as well as ensures that no complex type is accidentally left inextensible.
sentences.cn: 这减少了编写和维护模式的工作量，还确保了不会有某个复杂类型被偶然遗漏而不能扩展。

sentences.en: Willy-nilly, no-schema, non-organized data is a recipe for disaster!
sentences.cn: 杂乱无章、无模式、无组织的数据是造成灾难的因素！
